description:
Transform your multiline input into a powerful chat tool with Chat Input PRO.

Features:

Monitor changes in the input field in real time, instantly capturing each update.

Supports file uploads via paste or drag-and-drop in the input field or any designated element.

Automatically converts pasted or dropped files to Base64 strings and blobURLs, with MIME type published, enabling seamless file handling in workflows.

Includes a complete, categorized native emoji list within the Chat Input element.
